title: Itaewon crowd crush: thousands join vigil as anger grows in South Korea
description:
Law enforcement concedes insufficient planning as president belatedly expresses regret for disaster

Thousands of people gathered near Seoulâ€™s city hall on Saturday to commemorate the 156 people killed in a Halloween crowd crush in Itaewon last weekend.

Christian and Buddhist leaders spoke on stage, demanding President Yoon Suk-yeol step down and asking how the country could mourn without knowing the truth behind the deaths.

Continue reading...
dc:creator: Raphael Rashid in Seoul and agency
